DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Compare pelvic floor disorder ( urinary incontinence , anal incontinence , genital prolapse , perineal pain , sexual trouble ) 12 month first delivery group woman prenatal pelvic floor exercise control group . Hypothesis : Prenatal pelvic floor exercise reduce postpartum urinary incontinence .
DOC.detailed_description: Justification : Pelvic floor disorder lead handicap medical care consumption . Pregnancy delivery main etiology . Pelvic floor exercise propose prevention may reduce immediate postpartum incontinence know preventive effect persist 1 year . Principal criterion : - Urinary incontinence score 12 month post-partum ( ICIQ-SF ) Secondary criterion : - Urinary incontinence prevalence pregnancy end , 2 12 month post-partum - Other pelvic floor disorder pregnancy end , 2 12 month post-partum : symptom questionnaire , QOL questionnaire , Pad-test , POP-Q . - Mode delivery , length active second phase , perineal tear , Apgar score . - Number postpartum pelvic floor session , number medical consultation , Kegel exercise . Progress : - Inclusion 20 28 week , initial assessment , randomization . - 8 session pelvic floor exercise physiotherapist 24 36 week versus write information . - Assessment pregnancy end , 2 12 ( +/-1 ) month post-partum Study length : - For woman 18 month . - For center 30 month . Number subject : - To show 1 point difference ICIQ-SF score , need 182 subject ( sd=2,4 , a=0,05 , Î²=0,20 bilateral test ) . - Taking account lose follow-up ( estimate 1/3 ) go include 280 woman .
DOC.criteria: nulliparous age 18 year pregnant 20 28 week French language reader No medical insurance multiple pathologic pregnancy Previous pelvic floor exercise physiotherapist less 6 month pregnancy
